Enum InternetProtocolFamily

    @Deprecated
public enum InternetProtocolFamily
extends java.lang.Enum<InternetProtocolFamily>
    Deprecated.
    use SocketProtocolFamily.
    Internet Protocol (IP) families used by the DatagramChannel
